actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide an exemption from the minimum wage and overtime requirements of that act for full-time babysitters.

summary.text: Provides, under the Fair Labor Standards Act, an exemption from the minimum wage and overtime requirements of that Act for full-time babysitters.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide an exemption from the minimum wage and overtime requirements of that act for full-time babysitters.
